execution_plan.description: Find categories that have no active products in store_main
execution_plan.query: SELECT categories.id AS s1__id, categories.name AS s1__name FROM categories WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE products.category_id = categories.id AND products.is_active = true);

execution_plan.description: Find product groups that have no active items in store_alt
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_groups.gid AS s2__gid, product_groups.group_name AS s2__group_name FROM product_groups WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM items WHERE items.group_ref = product_groups.gid AND items.active = 'Y');
